net.bubbaland.trivia

Interface TriviaInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TriviaServer

    public interface TriviaInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The interface for the trivia server. TriviaInterface provides the method API for calls to the trivia server.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski

      • editQuestion

        void editQuestion(java.lang.String user,
                int rNumber,
                int qNumber,
                int value,
                java.lang.String qText,
                java.lang.String aText,
                boolean isCorrect,
                java.lang.String submitter,
                java.lang.String operator)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Edit question data.
        Parameters:
        rNumber - The round number
        qNumber - The question number
        value - The new question value
        qText - The new question text
        aText - The new correct answer
        isCorrect - Whether the question was answered correctly
        submitter - The correct answer submitter
        operator - The operator who accepted the correct answer
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getChangedRounds

        Round[] getChangedRounds(java.lang.String user,
                       int[] oldVersions)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get rounds that have changed. This is the primary method for retrieving updated data from the server.
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting data
        oldVersions - The round version numbers the user has.
        Returns:
        An array of all the rounds that have newer versions.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getCurrentRound

        int getCurrentRound()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the current round number
        Returns:
        The current round number
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getTrivia

        Trivia getTrivia()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the full trivia data structure. This is used primarily when a client starts to initialize their local trivia data.
        Returns:
        The Trivia object
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - A remote exception

      • getActiveUsers

        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,UserList.Role> getActiveUsers(int window,
                                                                 int timeout)
                                                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the users and roles that have been active. Active means having changed something on the server.
        Parameters:
        window - Number of seconds without making a change before becoming idle
        Returns:
        The user names and roles of users who have been active within the activity window
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getIdleUsers

        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,UserList.Role> getIdleUsers(int window,
                                                               int timeout)
                                                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the users and roles that are idle. Idle means they are still contacting the server for updates, but haven't made any changes.
        Parameters:
        window - Number of seconds without making a change before becoming idle
        timeout - Number of second before a disconnected user should be considered timed out
        Returns:
        The user names and roles of users who have not been active but have still received an update within the timeout window
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
